actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of Haines, Alaska, interests of the United States in certain lands.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of Haines, Alaska, interests of the United States in specified lands upon conditions set forth in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the city of Haines, Alaska, interests of the United States in certain lands.
